alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; McClain; Pontotoc; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 2:52AM CDT until July 11 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Southwestern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 252 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Asher to 4 miles northeast of Rosedale to near Purcell, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Slaughterville, Wynnewood, Lexington, Stratford, Wayne, Paoli, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Byars, Etowah, Rosedale, Whitebead, and Trousdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
